notes.text:
This update for libguestfs fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-2211: Fixed a buffer overflow in get_keys (bsc#1201064).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A vulnerability was found in libguestfs. This issue occurs while calculating the greatest possible number of matching keys in the get_keys() function. This flaw leads to a denial of service, either by mistake or malicious actor.
notes.title: CVE description
